vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.35;
son of: Micah (H4318H);
brother of: Melech (H4429), Tarea (H8390) and Ahaz (H0271H)
§ Pithon = "harmless"
son of Micah, grandson of Mephibosheth, descendant of Saul
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Micaías; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
毗敦 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "無害的"
米迦的兒子, 米非波設的孫子, 掃羅的後代
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
毗敦 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "无害的"
米迦的儿子, 米非波设的孙子, 扫罗的后代
